sentences.en: an enclosed area
sentences.cn: 有围墙的区域

sentences.en: Before posting a letter, you should enclose it in an envelope.
sentences.cn: 在把信寄出之前你必须把它装入信封内.

sentences.en: Enclose the flower in a small muslin bag.
sentences.cn: 把这花用一个小棉袋包起来。

sentences.en: Enclose the pot in a clear polythene bag.
sentences.cn: 将罐子装在透明的塑胶袋中。

sentences.en: Farmers often enclose their land with hedges.
sentences.cn: 农夫们常用树篱将他们的地围起来.

sentences.en: I enclose a cheque in settlement of your account.
sentences.cn: 兹附支票一张以结清贵处帐目.

sentences.en: I enclose here with a draft for the sum of 100 dollars.
sentences.cn: 兹附上100美元汇票一张.

sentences.en: I enclose herewith a cheque for 20 pounds.
sentences.cn: 随信附上二十镑支票一张.

sentences.en: I enclose herewith a copy of the policy.
sentences.cn: 我随信附上一份保险单。

sentences.en: I enclose two tickets along with this letter.
sentences.cn: 我随信附上两张票.

sentences.en: I'll enclose his letter with mine.
sentences.cn: 我将他的信装入我的信中寄出.

sentences.en: If you would like to send a donation to Cobuild, please enclose a cheque with your coupon.
sentences.cn: 如果你想为Cobuild语料库捐款，请随订货单附上支票。

sentences.en: Make sure you enclose all the relevant certificates.
sentences.cn: 要保证把所有相关证书都放在里面。

sentences.en: Please enclose a cheque with your order.
sentences.cn: 请随订单附上支票。

sentences.en: Please enclose a stamped addressed envelope to get your test results.
sentences.cn: 请附姓名地址邮资俱全的信封，以便把化验结果寄给你。

sentences.en: Please enclose an sae for your test results.
sentences.cn: 请附姓名地址邮资俱全的信封，以便邮递化验结果。

sentences.en: Please enclose your remittance, making cheques payable to Thames Valley Technology.
sentences.cn: 请附上汇款，支票收款人为泰晤士河谷科技公司。

sentences.en: Referring to my conversation with you today, I now enclose an order sheet for hosiery as specified.
sentences.cn: 参照今日和你方的谈判记录, 兹随函寄上详细叙述订购卫生衣的订单2份,请查收.

sentences.en: The pool area is enclosed by a six-foot wall.
sentences.cn: 游泳区用六英尺高的高墙围了起来。

sentences.en: The rules state that samples must be enclosed in two watertight containers.
sentences.cn: 条例规定样品必须用两个不漏水的容器封装起来。

words.tran_cn: 附上（enclose的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to put something inside an envelope as well as a letter

trans.tran_cn: 围住， 包住； 把…装入信封， 附上
trans.tran_en: to put something inside an envelope as well as a letter
